This block requires two dashboard images for the product showcase.

Download and place them in your public/images/ folder:
- public/images/dashboard-light.png → https://glsilk.vercel.app/images/dashboard-light.png
- public/images/dashboard-dark.png  → https://glsilk.vercel.app/images/dashboard-dark.png

Or replace them with your own product screenshots.
